rooms.title: Rooms & Suites
rooms.subtitle: Premium Accommodation
rooms.heroDescription: Discover our selection of carefully designed rooms and suites, each offering premium comfort for an unforgettable stay.

deluxeTwinGarden.name: Comfortable Double Room
deluxeTwinGarden.description: Enjoy a comfortable stay in our double room. Modern design and comfort combined.
deluxeTwinGarden.longDescription: Our comfortable double room offers 35 square meters of thoughtfully designed space with a double bed, modern bathroom and all essential amenities. Every detail has been carefully considered for a comfortable and pleasant stay. Ideal for couples.

deluxeFrenchGarden.name: Triple Room
deluxeFrenchGarden.description: Discover comfort in our triple room, accommodating up to three guests. Ideal for families or friends.
deluxeFrenchGarden.longDescription: Our triple room offers 35 square meters of refined living space. With a double bed and sophisticated interior design it provides a comfortable stay for up to three guests.

deluxeFrenchCity.name: Suite Room
deluxeFrenchCity.description: Experience spacious luxury in our suite. Thoughtful design details await you.
deluxeFrenchCity.longDescription: Our suite offers 35 square meters of contemporary space. With double and single bed options and a generous living area, it is ideal for families or groups of friends. A memorable stay with all the comforts.

sustainability.subtitle: Our Promise to the Future
sustainability.title: Sustainability
sustainability.description: On our sustainability journey, we are eager to accelerate our steps with all our team, business partners, and dear guests on this path we take with hope and excitement.

energy.title: Energy Efficiency
energy.description: We use renewable energy sources and energy-efficient systems throughout our property.

water.title: Water Conservation
water.description: Advanced water management systems help us minimize water waste and preserve this precious resource.

waste.title: Waste Reduction
waste.description: Comprehensive recycling programs and composting initiatives reduce our environmental footprint.

local.title: Local Sourcing
local.description: We partner with local suppliers and farmers to support the community and reduce transportation emissions.

green.title: Green Spaces
green.description: Our gardens and green spaces provide natural habitats and improve air quality.

materials.title: Sustainable Materials
materials.description: We prioritize eco-friendly and sustainable materials in our construction and operations.

commitment.paragraph1: At AirPark Hotel, sustainability is not just a policy—it's a way of life. We are committed to reducing our environmental impact while providing exceptional hospitality experiences.
commitment.paragraph2: We continuously evaluate and improve our practices, investing in innovative technologies and partnering with like-minded organizations to create a more sustainable future for our guests, team, and community.
commitment.paragraph3: Together with our guests and partners, we are building a legacy of environmental stewardship that will benefit generations to come.

cta.title: Book your place for an unforgettable experience.

gallery.title: Gallery
gallery.subtitle: Discover AirPark Hotel
gallery.description: Explore our hotel through photos and videos. Get a glimpse of our rooms, facilities, and the experiences that await you.

spa.title: Spa & Wellness
spa.subtitle: Relaxation & Rejuvenation
spa.description: Escape to our luxurious spa and wellness center. Indulge in a variety of treatments designed to relax your body and rejuvenate your mind.

meeting.title: Events
meeting.subtitle: Professional Event Spaces
meeting.description: Host birthdays, weddings, engagements, corporate events or special celebrations at AirPark Hotel. Our modern venues and professional services create unforgettable experiences.

booking.title: Make a Reservation
booking.subtitle: Book Your Stay
booking.description: Complete the form below to reserve your room. Our team will contact you shortly to confirm your reservation.

contact.title: Contact Information
contact.description: You can also reach us directly through the following channels:

contactPage.title: Contact & Transport
contactPage.subtitle: Get in Touch
contactPage.description: Contact us for any questions or reservation requests.
contactPage.transportByCarDescription: Use the map below for directions or click Open in Google Maps to get turn-by-turn navigation to our address.
contactPage.transportByPlaneDescription: You can reach us by flying to Eskişehir Anadolu Airport. Contact our reception for transfer or car rental options from the airport to the hotel.
contactPage.planeNotice: Air traffic must review the approach procedures on the S.H.M. website and obtain a SLOT by contacting Display Director Aysan Keskin.
